attributes.action: Allow pupils to choose their preferred method for taking their exam
attributes.additional_details: Follow us on Twitter at @examtheexam for updates about this petition.
attributes.background: The current method for taking exams (sitting in a room in silence, answering questions) is a dated method and isn't fair for all pupils. People thrive better in different situations. Some do better in exams, some do better with essays.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Allow pupils to choose their preferred method for taking their exam". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the 
Government or Parliament to do.
